title: VIKTOR EMBLEM
body: What is viktor emblem used for in hextech crafting there is just "material".

replies.body: i still dont get why viktor gets an emblem during a yasuo/riven event

When's the last time Viktor got a skin?

He has to have _something!_

######No, joke didn't go over my head.
LMAO yo it's the "Victor's Emblem". Not Viktor. The victor. The person who is victorious: Order or Chaos.

At the end of the event, it will be able to change into the icon of which ever side wins. 

Namely, these two:
https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2F2.bp.blogspot.com%2F-e5YCSodc-WQ%2FWS9DHrqKvQI%2FAAAAAAABDt4%2FbHs_cPtB_PIxTcIvUd5nICH2AEgUbFozQCLcB%2Fs1600%2F8900cfa59b38e074.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150 https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2F4.bp.blogspot.com%2F-qo76vTf8wOk%2FWS9DHzVkkzI%2FAAAAAAABDuI%2FBXhrAKvmuLk4tn7BPjWbarrtyxLwi5FRACLcB%2Fs1600%2Ffc42083b7079ae68.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150
Will we be able to disenchant it though? I would expect it would be unlocked permanently without our permission like all the other summoner icons that drop from chests.
hope that we will go team Riven!
